item.description:
Alright boys, in celebration of the upcoming Cinco De Mayo, Hartford bars throw a big block party on Friday May 1st and it only seems right that the CT Wingmen attend.
We will be meeting up at Koji for the pre-meetup to talk and plan the night out in full.
Please be there ON TIME to help prepare for a night dedicated to winging (as this is a skill we should all have).
Thanks
item.name: Friday Night - May 1st - Hartford Block Party
